title: Design, synthesis and in vitro anti-proliferative evaluation of new pyridine-2,3-dihydrothiazole/thiazolidin-4-one hybrids as dual CDK2/GSK3β kinase inhibitors
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31607-31623
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06146B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Asmaa F. Kassem, Ashraf A. Sediek, Mervat M. Omran, Doaa S. Foda, Aisha A. K. Al-Ashmawy
Hybridization of pyridine with 2,3-dihydrothiazole or thiazolidin-4-one by ethylidenehydrazono spacer was crucial for dual CDK2/GSK3β inhibitory activity and good antiproliferative activity. The most potent compound 13a can act as promising lead.
